name: Magic Crystal Quest
description:
Your mother has become ill from a deadly disease for which there is no earthly remedy.

With time running out you turn to the arcane. Through your studies you learn of a secret artifact in some nearby ruins that may hold the key to your mother's cure.

This game was created for the Untitled Game Jam #62: https://itch.io/jam/untitled-game-jam-62

Controls:

  • Move with the arrow keys or WASD
  • Aim and shoot magic bolts using the mouse and left click
  • Travel between universes by pressing the "1" and "2" keys
